rows.label: tev011101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev011101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Kent about the people of New LA.

rows.label: tev011101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev011101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Kent if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev011101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Kent about mimeosomes.

rows.label: tev011101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Kent about mimeosomes.

rows.label: tev011101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Kent about the Lifehold Core.

rows.label: tev011101_SEL1061
rows.name: Ask Kent about recent developments.

rows.label: tev011101_SEL2071
rows.name: Ask Kent about recent developments.

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Even the residents of New LA who are not members of
BLADE are actively supporting the city in some capacity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0002
rows.name:
After all, we also share the burden of being among
humanity's last survivors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0003
rows.name:
I, for example, have the role of keeping BLADEs in
tip-top condition.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm willing to sacrifice anything to help BLADE succeed.
I would heal those who are building our new legacy
even at the cost of my own life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0005
rows.name:
And what of you? Are you prepared to do your duty
as one of humanity's last survivors?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0010
rows.name:
I do not engage in gossip or any other forms of idle
conversation that serve no clear purpose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0011
rows.name:
But I suppose Sherry over there may have a few
interesting things to share. She's very popular with
the BLADEs, and gets to hear a lot of their stories.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0012
rows.name:
I don't know if any of it would be of interest to you,
but if you wish to know of happenings outside the city,
you should speak with her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0018
rows.name:
Our mimeosomes are every bit as delicate as our
physical bodies, if not more so. They require a great
deal of regular maintenance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0019
rows.name:
Since no one has been in their current mimeosomes
for long, there have been few mechanical failures as
of yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0020
rows.name:
But our mimeosomes will begin to degrade over time.
And when they do, mimeosome technicians like myself
will be in even greater demand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0021
rows.name:
Of course, if we're able to return to our normal bodies
before that happens, there won't be a problem.
But we can't afford to take that as a given.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0022
rows.name:
For now, we must train additional mimeosome
technicians to ensure our continued survival for as
long as we remain in these bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0028
rows.name:
The mimeosomes of a great many BLADEs have been
lost in the battle with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0029
rows.name:
We're faring well in terms of replacement limbs like
arms and legs, but our stock of organ-like internal
components has been significantly diminished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0030
rows.name:
I am more than willing to donate my own components
to a BLADE, should that become necessary.
I consider it my duty as a mimeosome technician.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0031
rows.name:
Fortunately, the Lifehold Core has been discovered.
If we're able to retrieve it, such drastic measures will
not need to be taken.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0032
rows.name:
I need you to bring us the ultimate in human
components. The ones that humanity has been
developing since time immemorial...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0033
rows.name: I need you to bring back our flesh-and-blood bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0038
rows.name:
My superiors are still performing operational
experiments on the Lifehold Core in secret.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0039
rows.name:
If they would be willing to include me in their briefings,
I could share my expertise as a mimeosome specialist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0040
rows.name:
But I haven't heard a word from any of them.
I'm beginning to fear that something is amiss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG0041
rows.name:
What could this mean? Everyone is eagerly awaiting
the return of their real bodies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG1001
rows.name:
Sherry has become obsessed with Wrothian curry,
and has failed to return from the commercial district
in a timely manner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG1002
rows.name:
She knows full well that to a mimeosome, sensations
such as taste are merely data. She could upload the
taste of that curry right here at the maintenance center.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG1003
rows.name:
And yet, to experience her daily curry, she waits in line
outside of a restaurant, wasting valuable time that
could be better spent here at work. It's preposterous![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG1004
rows.name:
She is not the only human to have fallen into this
curry trap. I hope you can avoid succumbing to its
temptation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG2001
rows.name:
In my conversations with Lyvia, I've learned something
of great value to myself as a mimeosome technician.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG2002
rows.name:
During our interactions, my body temperature rose.
Additionally, I experienced violent reverberations in my
central circulatory components.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG2003
rows.name:
For when humans fall in love, the physiological
ramifications can be experienced even within our
mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011101_MSG2004
rows.name:
These mimeosomes truly are impressive technology.
And while our relationship failed, it was well worth the
time investment to have learned that fact.[ST:wait ]
